segments.text: Has everything been OK with you lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t been able to get a good night ’ s sleep lately . I ’ m exhausted !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you been too busy to get enough sleep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I try to go to sleep , but I just can ’ t stay asleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How late do you try to go to sleep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go to bed when I finish my work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has anything in your day-to-day life been bothering you lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am worried about how I am going to pay my tuition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You might consider listening to relaxing music as you go to sleep to clear your head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Doing something relaxing before I go to sleep sounds like a plan .
segments.speaker: S2
